name: Zombie Crusher Mobile
description:
You are a survivor in a city full of zombies, kill them to survive. As we all know the weakness of zombie is their head, so go for the head.

Control are same as any fps game. 

Use joystick to move on right side of screen, 

Use left of screen to look around and up down, 

Button for shoot, jump, aim, reload and change weapon is given.
